t: Is Nellie’s All-Natural free from MI? | Methylisothiazolinone Free
s: May 1, 2016 - It's easy to assume that any brand proclaiming its 'natural' qualities will be free from methylisothiazolinone (MI) and related preservatives, but that may not be the case. Canadian household cleaning brand Nellie's All-Natural arguably goes further with that 'All' - so I looked into the brand.
